title: The Jacobi operator of some special minimal hypersurfaces
abstract:
In this work we discuss stability and nondegeneracy properties of some
special families of minimal hypersurfaces embedded in $\mathbb{R}^m\times
\mathbb{R}^n$ with $m,n\geq 2$. These hypersurfaces are asymptotic at infinity
to a fixed Lawson cone $C_{m,n}$. In the case $m+n\ge 8$, we show that such
hypersurfaces are strictly stable and we provide a full classification of their
bounded Jacobi fields, which in turn allows us to prove the non-degeneracy of
such surfaces. In the case $m+n\le 7$, we prove that such hypersurfaces have
infinite Morse index.
